name: folder-party
description: playground for a static site generator to create folder parties

scripts.test: npm run build && OVERWRITE=true FOLDER=generator/test/testdata node generator/dist/index.js
scripts.theme.dev: PORT=2350 FOLDER=public/theme-builder npx nodemon --watch public/theme-builder --ext js,html,css dev-server.js

author: lizz thabet
